title: Will there ever be a champion based on speed?
body: Will there ever be a champion where his ultimate will be a huge flash and like his q,w,e are based on ad/speed. kinda like hecarim but he relies on it more. I feel like this would be a cool mechanic. Idk may be a little op. I'm sure you could make it to where it would work though.

replies.body: A cool concept, but a bit too similar to the Flash
I guess. It would be more like a timeweaver. someone who could cut holes in reality and move to other holes. kinda like a reksai e but faster and farther. other abilities would differ
Speed doesn't change enough, so you can't really have speed ratios.
